name: Gowrik Felrou
content:
Gowrik Felrou was a male Cathar underboss of the Starbolts gang operating in the Free Zone, a black market on Asylum, a space station in Wild Space functioning as a shadowport. Armed with a blaster pistol, wrist flamethrower, wrist shock device, and a jump pack-like device, Felrou fought in the gang war between the Blast Crew and the Starbolts in 3631 BBY. He was killed by the Commander and HK-55, who were searching for a member of Koth Vortena's crew, Tora.
Gowrik Felrou appears in Chapter VI: Asylum in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 digital expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. While his affiliation is not explicitly stated in-game, Felrou's NPC is assigned to the faction hostile1 along with the rest of the Starbolts in the area, while the Blast Crew members are hostile2.
